content.title: Omental Flap Coverage
content.description: Use of omentum for coverage of infected vascular grafts

key_concepts.details: Highly vascular, immunologically active, conforms to irregular surfaces
Left or right gastroepiploic artery; can reach pelvis/groin
Mobilize off transverse colon; divide short gastric vessels if needed
Infected aortic grafts, AEF, groin wound coverage

content.clinical_significance: Gold standard for coverage of infected aortic grafts

primary_sources: Arko FR et al. J Vasc Surg 1999
